Everyday Cognition - Participant Self-Report

Source: R/data.R
ECOGPT.Rd

Everyday Cognition - Participant Self-Report data. More information is available at https://adni.loni.usc.edu/data-samples/adni-data/

Usage

data(ECOGPT)

Format

A data frame with 8088 observations and 63 variables.

Source

https://adni.loni.usc.edu/data-samples/adni-data/

Details

  • ORIGPROT character Original study protocol , with options: ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2, ADNI3

  • COLPROT factor Study protocol of data collection , with factor levels: ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2, ADNI3, ADNI4

  • PTID character Participant ID

  • RID numeric Range value: 2, ..., 7125

  • VISCODE character

  • VISCODE2 character Translated visit code

  • VISDATE Date Assessment COLDATE when present; otherwise Registry EXAMDATE Date: YYY-MM-DD

  • CONCERN character Are you concerned that you have a memory or other thinking problem?

    • ADNIGO: 1=Yes;0=No

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes;0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • MEMORY1 character 1. Remembering a few shopping items without a list.

    • ADNIGO: 1=1- Better or no change; 2=2- Questionable/occasionally worse; 3=3- Consistently a little worse; 4=4- Consistently much worse; 9=9- I don't know

    • ADNI2: 1=1- Better or no change; 2=2- Questionable/occasionally worse; 3=3- Consistently a little worse; 4=4- Consistently much worse; 9=9- I don't know

    • ADNI3: 1=1- Better or no change;2=2- Questionable/occasionally worse;3=3- Consistently a little worse;4=4- Consistently much worse;9=9- I don't know

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • MEMORY2 character 2. Remembering things that happened recently (such as recent outings, events in the news).

    • ADNIGO: 1=1- Better or no change; 2=2- Questionable/occasionally worse; 3=3- Consistently a little worse; 4=4- Consistently much worse; 9=9- I don't know

    • ADNI2: 1=1- Better or no change; 2=2- Questionable/occasionally worse; 3=3- Consistently a little worse; 4=4- Consistently much worse; 9=9- I don't know

    • ADNI3: 1=1- Better or no change;2=2- Questionable/occasionally worse;3=3- Consistently a little worse;4=4- Consistently much worse;9=9- I don't know

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • MEMORY3 character 3. Recalling conversations a few days later.

    • ADNIGO: 1=1- Better or no change; 2=2- Questionable/occasionally worse; 3=3- Consistently a little worse; 4=4- Consistently much worse; 9=9- I don't know

    • ADNI2: 1=1- Better or no change; 2=2- Questionable/occasionally worse; 3=3- Consistently a little worse; 4=4- Consistently much worse; 9=9- I don't know

    • ADNI3: 1=1- Better or no change;2=2- Questionable/occasionally worse;3=3- Consistently a little worse;4=4- Consistently much worse;9=9- I don't know

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • MEMORY4 character 4. Remembering where I have placed objects.

    • ADNIGO: 1=1- Better or no change; 2=2- Questionable/occasionally worse; 3=3- Consistently a little worse; 4=4- Consistently much worse; 9=9- I don't know

    • ADNI2: 1=1- Better or no change; 2=2- Questionable/occasionally worse; 3=3- Consistently a little worse; 4=4- Consistently much worse; 9=9- I don't know

    • ADNI3: 1=1- Better or no change;2=2- Questionable/occasionally worse;3=3- Consistently a little worse;4=4- Consistently much worse;9=9- I don't know

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • MEMORY5 character 5. Repeating stories and/or questions.

  • DIVATT4 character 4. Cooking or working and talking at the same time.

    • ADNIGO: 1=1- Better or no change; 2=2- Questionable/occasionally worse; 3=3- Consistently a little worse; 4=4- Consistently much worse; 9=9- I don't know

    • ADNI2: 1=1- Better or no change; 2=2- Questionable/occasionally worse; 3=3- Consistently a little worse; 4=4- Consistently much worse; 9=9- I don't know

    • ADNI3: 1=1- Better or no change;2=2- Questionable/occasionally worse;3=3- Consistently a little worse;4=4- Consistently much worse;9=9- I don't know

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • STAFFASST character 1. How much assistance was needed from the research staff to complete this form?

    • ADNIGO: 1=None; 2=A little; 3=A lot; 4=Participant too cognitively impaired to complete

    • ADNI2: 1=None; 2=A little; 3=A lot; 4=Participant too cognitively impaired to complete

    • ADNI3: 1=None;2=A little;3=A lot;4=Participant too cognitively impaired to complete

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • VALIDITY character 2. Validity of the information collected from the participant (based on research assistant's observations and interactions with the participant while they were completing the ECog):

    • ADNIGO: 1=1- Appeared Valid–The participant did not express any confusion or ask for any clarification in completing the ECog.;2=2- Questionable Validity–The participant needed to have the instructions repeated, and/or needed help in understanding a few of the items.; 3=3- Appeared Invalid–The participant was clearly confused about the content of many of the questions or how to complete the form in general.;4=No information collected from participant

    • ADNI2: 1=1- Appeared Valid–The participant did not express any confusion or ask for any clarification in completing the ECog.;2=2- Questionable Validity–The participant needed to have the instructions repeated, and/or needed help in understanding a few of the items.; 3=3- Appeared Invalid–The participant was clearly confused about the content of many of the questions or how to complete the form in general.;4=No information collected from participant

    • ADNI3: 1=1- Appeared Valid–The participant did not express any confusion or ask for any clarification in completing the ECog.;2=2- Questionable Validity–The participant needed to have the instructions repeated, and/or needed help in understanding a few of the items.;3=3- Appeared Invalid–The participant was clearly confused about the content of many of the questions or how to complete the form in general.;4=No information collected from participant

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • SOURCE character Information Source: 1=Participant Visit;2=Telephone Call;3=Mail Decoded Value: Yes

  • EcogPtDivatt numeric Range value: 1, ..., 4

  • EcogPtLang numeric Range value: 1, ..., 4

  • EcogPtMem numeric Range value: 1, ..., 4

  • EcogPtOrgan numeric Range value: 1, ..., 4

  • EcogPtPlan numeric Range value: 1, ..., 4

  • EcogPtVisspat numeric Range value: 1, ..., 4

  • EcogPtTotal numeric Range value: 1, ..., 4

  • ID numeric Range value: 4, ..., 185602

  • SITEID numeric Range value: 1, ..., 63

  • USERDATE Date Date: YYY-MM-DD

  • USERDATE2 Date Date: YYY-MM-DD

  • update_stamp POSIXct POSIXct: YYY-MM-DD
